thread.title: Geocacher
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Geocacher

author: Geocacher
title: Geocacher
text: For many years I avoided purchasing tire from your company because I didn't like the salesperson there. Today I decided to try you again and I was totally satisfied with my service, what I paid for my tires. I felt good about my purchase.
